Chandigarh University Online

4.7 (253 user ratings)

Study Mode: Distance and Online

Institution Type : Private

About Chandigarh University

Chandigarh University Online Learning is a reputed online learning institutes in India that is UGC-DEB approved and has been awarded A+ Grade by National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) for maintaining high standards in delivering quality higher education.

Chandigarh University has received the E-Learning Excellence for Academic Digitization (E-Lead) certification and has been ranked among the top 5% of online university that are NAAC A+ accredited. The degree provided by Chandigarh Online University is globally recognized and accepted in India and Abroad.

Chandigarh University offers both undergraduate and postgraduate online programs. In the UG category, the university provides BA JMC, BBA, and BCA in the online mode. In the UG category , the university provides MCA, MA Eng, M.Sc, Mathematics, MA Economics, MA JMC, M.Com, MBA, and M.Sc Data Science in the online mode.

Chandigarh University has designed the curriculum of all its online courses with complete flexibility keeping in mind the needs of students who are working professional. The online learning platform of Chandigarh Online University offers a wide variety of study materials and other academic facilities.

Apart from quality education, Chandigarh University offers excellent placement assistance services like personalized career guidance from industry mentors, training on resume building, interview, soft skills, and aptitude. The online learners also gets access to the job portal endorsed by the university with 5000+ job opportunities.

  • Top-Ranked Universities
    • CU Online has been ranked amongst top 5% NAAC A+ accredited universities of India.
  • Great Placement Assistance
    • Get interview opportunities up to 6 months after graduation among other services.
  • International Tie-Ups
    • CU Online has 411 tie-ups with top international universities
Approvals
  • UGC-DEB

Admission Process

There is an online process for applying to CU online university. Fresh admission sessions starts periodically from time to time. Direct admissions are done in the CU online university which means there is no need to give an entrance exam for securing the admission seat.

The admission procedure 2024 for the online courses at Chandigarh University Online Learning is as follows

Step 1: Visit the official website of Chandigarh University Online Learning and click on Apply Now.

Step 2: Under “Register Today” fill in your personal details. After this, you will receive your login User ID and password via SMS or Email

Step 3: Now log in using the User ID and password to fill out the online application form and pay the program fee.

Step 4: Upload all the necessary documents by clicking on “Document Upload” along with your recent passport-size colored photograph and then click on the “Submit” button.

List of Documents
  • Marksheets
  • Residential Proof
  • Proof of Date of Birth
  • Government Issued ID
  • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
  • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
  • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
  • Two passport size colored photographs
  • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Enquire Now

Don’t hesitate to contact us for more information

Why Chandigarh University?

  • Chandigarh University Online Learning has been approved and entitled by UGC-DEB to offer online degree courses.
  • Chandigarh University has received an A+ Grade from NAAC and is among the top 5% of universities in India with NAAC A+ grade.
  • Chandigarh Online University is E-Learning Excellence for Academic Digitisation (E-LEAD) certified.
  • Chandigarh Online University has 300+ hiring partners
  • The online learners continue to receive opportunities for interviews with top companies even after completion of their course for up to 6 months.
  • Online learners get access to the university-endorsed job portal that has more than 5000 new jobs openings that are updated monthly.
